amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement or enforce the threatened species listing of the Preble's meadow jumping mouse under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 199 (Roll no. 450).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 199 (Roll no. 450).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
